lines.text: We wanna be free! We wanna be free to do what we wanna do. We wanna be free to ride. We wanna be free to ride our machines without being hassled by The Man! ... And we wanna get loaded. And we wanna have a good time. And that's what we are gonna do. We are gonna have a good time... We are gonna have a party.

[said jokingly to girl dancing]
Hey, don't get none of that on me!

[cops are coming]
Let's get out of here, Blues!
